ontopt.pen
Class Grammar

java.lang.Object
  ontopt.pen.Grammar

public class Grammar
extends java.lang.Object

Class from PEN Parser.

This class represents a grammar with the processing rules, read from a text file.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2002-2009

Company: CISUC

Version:
1.0
Author:
Nuno Seco, Hugo Gonçalo Oliveira

PARSE_ROOT

public static final java.lang.Integer PARSE_ROOT
The ID for a sentence. All Phrase types that are in upper case in the grammar file wiil be attributed a unique ID.
